mapper.insert: insert into position (position_id, vehicle_id, longitude, latitude, create_time) values (#{positionId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{vehicleId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{longitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{latitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.select: select position_id, vehicle_id, longitude, latitude, create_time from position
